Description_lang: Stormcaller Mylra is an experienced enhancement shaman and loyal champion of the Earthen Ring.A member of the Wildhammer clan, she shares a deep bond with Stormbeak, her gryphon. The two are rarely seen apart.
AuraDescription_lang: Stormcaller Mylra uses the power of the elements to enhance her physical attacks. There are few in the Wildhammer clan who can match her in battle.

name_blz.zh_TW: 追隨者：風暴召喚者米爾拉
name_blz.zh_CN: 追随者：风暴召唤者米尔拉

description_blz.en_US:
Stormcaller Mylra is an experienced enhancement shaman and loyal champion of the Earthen Ring.

A member of the Wildhammer clan, she shares a deep bond with Stormbeak, her gryphon. The two are rarely seen apart.
description_blz.es_MX:
Clamatormentas Mylra es una experimentada chamán de mejora y una campeona leal de El Anillo de la Tierra.

Como miembro del clan Martillo Salvaje, comparte un profundo vínculo con Picotormenta, su grifo. Es muy raro verlos separados.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Tempestária Mylra é uma experiente xamã de aperfeiçoamento e uma leal campeã da Harmonia Telúrica.

Membro do clã Martelo Feroz, ela partilha uma profunda ligação com Bicovento, seu grifo. Os dois raramente se separam.
description_blz.de_DE:
Sturmruferin Mylra ist eine erfahrene Verstärkungsschamanin und ein treuer Champion des Irdenen Rings.

Als Mitglied des Wildhammerklans verbindet sie ein tiefes Band mit ihrem Greifen Sturmschnabel. Die beiden werden selten getrennt voneinander gesehen.
description_blz.en_GB:
Stormcaller Mylra is an experienced enhancement shaman and loyal champion of the Earthen Ring.

A member of the Wildhammer clan, she shares a deep bond with Stormbeak, her gryphon. The two are rarely seen apart.
description_blz.es_ES:
La clamatormentas Mylra es una experta chamán Mejora y campeona fiel del Anillo de la Tierra.

Miembro del clan Martillo Salvaje, comparte un profundo vínculo con Picotormenta, su grifo. Rara vez se los ve separados.
description_blz.fr_FR:
La mande-foudre Mylra est une chamane Amélioration aguerrie et une championne du Cercle terrestre.

Membre du clan Marteau-hardi, elle est très proche de son griffon Foudrebec dont elle ne se sépare que rarement.
description_blz.it_IT:
L'Invocatrice delle Tempeste Mylra è una Sciamana esperta e una leale combattente del Circolo della Terra.

Membro del clan Granmartello, è molto legata a Beccotonante, il suo grifone, e raramente se ne separa.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Буревестница Милра – опытная шаманка и преданная защитница Служителей Земли, специализирующаяся на "Совершенствовании".

Она принадлежит к клану Громового Молота. У нее есть верный спутник – грифон Клюв Бури. Они практически неразлучны.
description_blz.ko_KR:
대지 고리회의 충성스러운 용사인 폭풍소환사 마일라는 숙련된 고양 주술사입니다.

와일드해머 드워프로서 자신의 그리핀인 폭풍부리와 깊은 유대를 가지고 있으며, 이 둘은 떨어져 지낸 적이 거의 없습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
風暴召喚者米爾拉是經驗豐富的增強薩滿，同時也是陶土議會忠實的勇士。

身為蠻錘氏族的一員，她與獅鷲獸風喙的羈絆很深。兩者幾乎形影不離。
description_blz.zh_CN:
风暴召唤者米尔拉是位经验丰富的增强萨满，也是一名忠于大地之环的勇士。

和其他蛮锤氏族的成员一样，她与自己的狮鹫风暴比克的感情十分深厚，两者很少分开。
